job_description:
Senior DevSecOps Engineer

We are seeking a Senior DevSecOps Engineer to lead cybersecurity, infrastructure automation, and DevSecOps practices as we transition to a secure, scalable, and modern engineering environment. This role will strengthen 2Base’s security posture, modernize pipelines, and foster a secure-by-design culture.

Key Responsibilities

  • Define, implement, and enforce security standards, policies, and best practices across cloud and on-prem environments.
  • Conduct security risk assessments, vulnerability scans, penetration testing, and execute mitigation plans.
  • Architect and enhance secure CI/CD pipelines with automated compliance and governance checkpoints.
  • Promote a "Security First" culture, ensuring secure design and development practices.
  • Monitor, detect, investigate, and respond to security threats, incidents, breaches, and anomalies.
  • Develop Infrastructure-as-Code practices using Terraform, Ansible, and automation frameworks.
  • Design secure cloud architectures on AWS, Azure, or GCP for scalable, compliant deployments.
  • Build and secure containerized environments with Docker and Kubernetes using enforced security baselines.
  • Implement secure monitoring, logging, SIEM, and alerting systems for infrastructure and applications.
  • Improve system reliability, scalability, performance, and fault tolerance across critical workloads.
  • Mentor DevOps engineers in secure development, automation, and operational excellence.
  • Lead technical strategy, tool selection, process improvements, and DevSecOps roadmap execution.
  • Collaborate with BA, PM, and Engineering teams to align security, performance, and delivery goals.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 4–8 years of experience in DevOps, Cloud, or Infrastructure engineering with strong security exposure.
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions).
  • Strong expertise in AWS, Azure, or GCP with a focus on secure architecture.
  • Proficiency in Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Experience securing Docker and Kubernetes environments.
  • Strong understanding of networking technologies (LAN/WAN, firewalls, VPN, load balancers).
  • Knowledge of security frameworks (OWASP, NIST, CIS Benchmarks).
  • Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, CloudWatch, SIEM).
  • Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash, Shell).
  • Excellent troubleshooting, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong communication and collaboration abilities to influence engineering teams.

Contact: Email your resume to careers@2basetechnologies.com if this opportunity aligns with your career goals.
summary: Lead cybersecurity and DevSecOps practices, modernizing pipelines and ensuring secure environments. Collaborate with teams using Terraform, AWS, and Kubernetes.

job_description:
Senior Business Analyst

At 2Base, we are rebuilding the Business Analyst function into a world-class, product-minded, clarity-driven team. This role is not a documentation role. It is not a screen updater role. It is not a support role. This is a core Business Analyst position responsible for functional modelling, system reasoning, requirement clarity, and building the foundation for correct development.

As a Senior Business Analyst, you will be the functional brain of the project. You will ensure that the right problem is understood, broken down, analysed, validated, clarified, communicated, and owned end-to-end. You will drive requirement precision, reduce rework, and enable confident and aligned delivery across teams.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead requirement workshops, client calls, and discovery discussions to understand business needs clearly.
  • Ask deeper questions, challenge assumptions, and validate the true business intent behind every requirement.
  • Convert ambiguous client inputs into structured, logical, and actionable functional understanding.
  • Break large features into modules, workflows, components, and clear dependencies.
  • Build strong system-level understanding involving APIs, integrations, data flow, and backend considerations.
  • Translate business processes into functional logic that development teams can execute.
  • Decompose requirements into use-case flows, system behaviours, edge cases, alternate paths, validation rules, and dependencies.
  • Prepare high-quality documentation, including BRD, FRD, SRS, workflows, state diagrams, data-flow diagrams, API requirement specs, and acceptance criteria.
  • Ensure all documentation is clear, logical, structured, testable, and ready for developers and QA to use.
  • Collaborate closely with developers, architects, QA, and product owners to validate feasibility and align understanding.
  • Ensure QA teams can derive test cases effectively from your functional logic and acceptance criteria.
  • Communicate confidently with clients, handle requirement discussions smoothly, and clarify misunderstandings immediately.
  • Push back politely on unclear or changing requirements and ensure final decisions are documented properly.
  • Maintain requirement traceability throughout the lifecycle and ensure zero ambiguity during handover to development.
  • Own the entire requirement lifecycle from discovery to development readiness with high accountability.
  • Drive clarity across teams by ensuring every requirement is complete, validated, and logically consistent.

Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum 4+ years of core Business Analyst experience with strong analytical and system-level thinking.
  • Ability to break down complex requirements into clear components, workflows, and functional logic.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication with confidence in client interactions and clarifications.
  • Proven experience in preparing SRS, BRD, FRD, workflows, and acceptance criteria with high clarity.
  • Ability to challenge assumptions politely, ask the right questions, and ensure zero ambiguity.
  • Strong collaboration experience with development, QA, architects, and cross-functional teams.
  • Understanding of API behaviours, integrations, data flows, and multi-module system interactions.
  • Ability to run requirement discussions, workshops, and independently lead discovery sessions.
  • Exposure to SaaS, scalable products, automation, or AI-supported systems is an added advantage.
  • Demonstrated ownership of requirements end-to-end, ensuring developer-ready and testable outputs.
  • Not suitable for UI-only thinkers, passive communicators, template-based writers, or those relying on AI for answers.
  • Success is defined by clear, testable requirements, zero rework, strong cross-team alignment, and confident communication.
  • Candidates must align with 2Base’s structured thinking, clarity-driven culture, and transformation of the BA function.

Minimum Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field
  • 4 to 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst
  • Experience in SaaS or scalable product environments
  • Exposure to AI/Automation, integrations, or multi-module systems
  • Ability to run independent client workshops
  • Must have independently handled requirement ownership for at least one full project lifecycle

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com.
summary: Senior Business Analyst role focused on functional modeling, system reasoning, and requirement clarity. Drives precision in requirements to enable aligned delivery across teams.

job_description:
Business Analyst

The Business Analyst plays a key role in ensuring requirements are clearly understood, accurately documented, and traceable throughout the software development lifecycle. This role focuses on translating business and functional inputs into structured, standardized documentation that supports effective development, testing, and delivery. Working closely with business analysts, design teams, and technical stakeholders, the role ensures consistency, clarity, and alignment across all requirement artifacts.

Key Responsibilities

  • Create Software Requirement Specifications (SRS) based on inputs from Core Business Analysts, stakeholder discussions, and requirement walkthroughs
  • Prepare Business Requirement Documents (BRD) using approved templates while ensuring business intent and system behavior are clearly documented
  • Participate in requirement discussions to understand business objectives, functional flows, dependencies, and assumptions before documentation
  • Analyze requirements to identify gaps, ambiguities, and inconsistencies, and work with Core BAs to resolve them
  • Document functional flows, business rules, and acceptance criteria where applicable to support development and QA teams
  • Document wireframes, UI flows, validations, and UI specifications in collaboration with design and product teams
  • Maintain change logs, version history, and document updates throughout the project lifecycle
  • Create and manage traceability matrices linking business, functional, and technical requirements
  • Maintain cross-references across BRD, SRS, UI, API, and related documentation
  • Ensure documentation consistency, completeness, and alignment with approved scope and delivery timelines
  • Ensure accurate and timely PMS updates with structured documentation details
  • Support development, QA, UAT, and audit processes through clear, traceable, and up-to-date documentation
  • Assist in requirement reviews, walkthroughs, and validation sessions with internal and client stakeholders

Requirements

Required Skills and Experience - 1 to 4 years of experience in Business Analysis documentation or related roles - Strong experience in BRD and SRS creation - Hands-on experience with documentation templates, standards, and version control - Ability to document UI wireframes and functional flows clearly - Working knowledge of APIs and system integrations for documentation purposes - Experience with project management systems and documentation tools - Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple documents in parallel - Excellent written communication and stakeholder coordination skills

Minimum Qualifications - Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field - 1 to 4 years of experience as a Business Analyst or Product Analyst

Benefits

  • A growth-driven environment with opportunities to lead, innovate, and upskill continuously.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@2basetechnologies.com
summary: Translates business needs into structured documentation for software development. Requires 1-4 years of experience in BRD/SRS creation and UI/API documentation.

job_title: QA Engineer - AI Accuracy & Validation Testing
job_description:
QA Engineer - AI Accuracy & Validation Testing

We are seeking a QA Engineer to join our AI Quality Assurance team, focusing on accuracy, robustness, reliability, and ethical validation of AI/ML and Generative AI systems. This role goes beyond traditional QA and involves testing non-deterministic, data-driven, and probabilistic AI outputs.

Key Responsibilities

AI-Specific Testing Responsibilities - Perform accuracy, validation, and consistency testing for AI/ML and Generative AI applications - Test non-deterministic systems where the same input may produce different outputs - Define and validate probabilistic acceptance criteria instead of fixed expected results - Conduct model robustness testing using noisy, edge-case, and adversarial inputs - Identify and report hallucinations in Generative AI (LLMs, chatbots, NLP systems) - Perform prompt testing and prompt regression testing to ensure stable AI responses after model or prompt updates - Validate explainability and justification of AI outputs (why a model produced a specific result) - Execute fairness, bias, and ethical testing to detect skewed, unsafe, or discriminatory AI behaviour

Manual & Automation Testing - Design and execute manual test cases for AI workflows, edge cases, and real-world scenarios - Validate AI outputs against datasets, expected patterns, statistical thresholds, and business rules - Develop and maintain automation scripts using Selenium with Python for AI-driven workflows - Automate repetitive AI accuracy, regression, and validation tests - Perform regression testing after model retraining, fine-tuning, or data updates

Collaboration & Documentation - Work closely with AI/ML engineers and data teams to understand models, prompts, inputs, and outputs - Analyse incorrect or inconsistent AI responses and log high-quality, detailed defects - Work with structured and unstructured data (text, images, datasets) for testing - Document test results, observations, risks, and AI improvement recommendations - Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies and sprint QA activities

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Completed QA training in Manual and Automation Testing
  • Strong understanding of testing fundamentals, SDLC, and STLC
  • Mandatory Python knowledge (academic projects or professional experience)
  • Mandatory experience or training in Selenium with Python
  • Ability to understand and test data-driven, logic-based, and AI-powered systems
  • Strong analytical thinking and attention to detail
  • Good verbal and written communication skills

Good to Have

  • Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts (models, datasets, accuracy, precision, recall, etc.)
  • Exposure to testing AI/ML applications, chatbots, NLP systems, LLMs, or recommendation engines
  • Familiarity with PyTest or other Python-based automation frameworks
  • Knowledge of test data preparation, validation, and labelling
  • Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodology
  • Awareness of AI ethics, bias, and responsible AI principles

Education

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, Data Science, or a related field

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at joinus@pearlsofttechnologies.com
summary: QA Engineer validates AI/ML systems for accuracy, robustness, and ethics. Requires Python, Selenium, and AI testing expertise.

About Us

We are a fast-growing, product-based company developing a multi-organization ERP and CRM platform for the education sector. Our solutions help schools, colleges, and universities streamline operations, improve collaboration, and manage multiple campuses efficiently. With a strong focus on usability, scalability, and innovation, we enable educational institutions to operate smarter and deliver better outcomes.

Role Overview

We are seeking a Senior SEO Specialist with 4+ years of experience to drive international search visibility across multiple regions and platforms. This role focuses on global SEO strategy, Generative Engine Optimization (GEO), technical SEO, authoritative content creation, and high-quality link building. You will collaborate with content and development teams to optimize site architecture, improve discoverability in traditional and AI-driven search engines, and translate complex technical concepts into search-optimized, high-impact content. The role requires strong ownership, a data-driven mindset, and the ability to manage SEO initiatives end-to-end in a globally distributed environment.

Responsibilities

  1. International & Multi-Regional SEO
  2. Manage and optimize SEO for international domains (ccTLDs, subdomains, or subdirectories) including complex hreflang implementations.
  3. Monitor, develop, and execute global search trends to maintain visibility across different time zones and cultural contexts.

  4. Conduct market-specific keyword research, moving beyond literal translations to capture regional search intent and cultural nuances.

  5. Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)

  6. Optimize website architecture and content to rank within AI-driven search engines and "AI Overviews."

  7. Focus on brand citations, entity authority, and semantic relevance to ensure the brand is recommended by LLMs (Large Language Models).

  8. High-Impact Outreach & Link Building

  9. Lead international outreach campaigns to acquire high-authority backlinks from global publications and niche-specific sites.

  10. Manage relationships with international webmasters and influencers to build a diverse, high-quality link profile.

  11. Technical Content Writing

  12. Produce and edit technical content (whitepapers, deep-dive blogs, documentation) that is both SEO-friendly and authoritative.

  13. Translate complex technical features into clear, benefit-driven copy that resonates with developers or B2B decision-makers globally.

  14. Technical & On-Page SEO

  15. Conduct deep-dive audits into site health, focusing on Core Web Vitals, schema markup (JSON-LD), and crawlability.
  16. Collaborate with dev teams to implement technical recommendations across international subdomains.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Experience: Minimum 4 years in a dedicated SEO role, with a proven track record in international project management.
  • GEO Mastery: Deep understanding of how AI engines synthesize information and how to optimize for "citatability."
  • Content Prowess: Exceptional technical writing skills in English; ability to write for humans first and search engines second.
  • Technical Stack: Analytics: GA4, Google Search Console, Looker Studio; SEO Tools: Ahrefs, Semrush, Screaming Frog, SurferSEO/Clearscope; CMS: Proficiency in WordPress or other CMS.
  • Outreach: Proven experience with tools like BuzzStream, Hunter.io, or manual high-level PR outreach.
  • Attributes: A "self-starter" mindset with the ability to work across different time zones and collaborate with remote international teams.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with Python for SEO or automated data collection.
  • Familiarity with HTML/CSS and JavaScript as it relates to SEO performance.
  • Certification in Advanced SEO or Google Analytics.

How to Apply

Apply via Career Estrrado OR send your resume to career@estrrado.com with the subject line: SEO Specialist.
summary: Senior SEO Specialist with 4+ years of experience needed to drive global SEO strategy, GEO, technical SEO, and content creation for an education ERP/CRM platform. Focus on international outreach and AI-driven search optimization.

Tools & Methodologies - Git, Jira - Agile/Scrum development practices - Unit & integration testing

  • 6+ years of professional experience in MERN stack development

  • Balance hands-on coding with team leadership
  • Drive continuous improvement, learning, and innovation

  • Developing and integrating new processes in the New Product Development Stage (NPDS), including DFA, DFS, DVA, ergonomics, and cable routing.
  • Designing BMS architecture with a focus on SOC, SOH, cell balancing, fault detection, safety controls, and protection algorithms.
  • Implementing thermal management, energy management, and life optimization algorithms.
  • Proficiency in communication protocols (RS485, Modbus, CAN) and custom protocol implementation.
  • Preparing SOPs, work instructions, and quality checklists.
  • Familiarity with battery chemistries (NMC, LiFePO4) and their impact on BMS behavior.
  • Integrating BMS data into higher-level systems/dashboards for monitoring and control.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and test embedded software/firmware for BMS applications.
  • Integrate/configure BMS hardware (microcontrollers, sensors, CAN, UART, SPI, I2C).
  • Implement SOC/SOH/cell balancing algorithms.
  • Collaborate with hardware engineers on PCB layouts and co-validation.
  • Ensure compliance with electrical/thermal/mechanical battery requirements.
  • Develop diagnostic tools and perform root-cause analysis for field issues.
  • Document software design, validation protocols, and change logs.

Preferred Skills

  • Solid understanding of BMS architecture, components, and safety features.
  • Experience in Li-Ion battery assembly, adhesive dispensing, production engineering, and quality checkpoints.
  • Knowledge of LV/HV battery system handling.
  • Expertise in BMS architecture, SOC/SOH/cell balancing, fault detection, and safety controls.
  • Proficiency in thermal/energy management and life optimization algorithms.
  • Experience with RS485/Modbus/CAN protocols.
  • Ability to read/implement custom communication protocols.

Added Advantage

  • Knowledge of functional safety standards (e.g., ISO 26262).

Qualifications

  • B.Tech in ECE/EEE
  • 2+ years of experience in battery management systems
  • Location: Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram

job_description:
iBoson Innovations (P) Ltd

Address: ACE 1, 3rd Floor, CDAC Building, Technopark Campus, Kazhakootam, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581 Website: http://www.iboson.io

Senior Back End Engineer - Node.js

Closing Date: 07 February 2026 Job Published: 02 February 2026 Contact Email: career@ibosoninnov.com

Brief Description At iBoson, we push the boundaries of Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to build next-gen solutions. We are expanding our team and looking for a skilled Node.js Developer to help develop robust, scalable, and high-performance backend systems for our products.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable server-side applications using Node.js.
  • Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and third-party services.
  • Optimize back-end processes for performance, security, and scalability.
  • Work closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements.
  • Manage and implement database solutions (SQL/NoSQL).
  • Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve back-end issues efficiently.
  • Follow best practices in code quality, testing, and documentation.

Preferred Skills/Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience in back-end development, with a focus on Node.js.
  • Strong understanding of JavaScript, TypeScript, and asynchronous programming.
  • Experience in building and managing RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
  • Proficiency in databases (MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL).
  • Knowledge of authentication and authorization mechanisms (JWT, OAuth).
  • Strong understanding of OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) Concepts.
  • Experience with server-side frameworks like Express.js, Nest.js, or similar.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure) is a plus.
  • Understanding of Agile methodologies and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Exposure to AI integrations in back-end applications is an advantage.
  • AR technology exposure is a plus.

What We Offer:

  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings.
  • Opportunity to work on challenging, high-impact projects.
  • Learning and career growth opportunities.
  • Collaborative and engineering-driven culture.

Be part of a team that thrives on innovation and problem-solving. At iBoson, you’ll work with emerging AR & AI technologies, contribute to impactful projects, and grow in a collaborative and tech-driven environment. If you're ready to take on exciting challenges, we’d love to hear from you! Send your resume to career@ibosoninnov.com.
summary: Senior Back End Engineer with Node.js expertise to develop scalable systems, integrating AI/AR technologies in a collaborative tech-driven environment.
